channel.title: Players can connect with an ip changer, but not my client?
channel.description: Hello, I portforwarded correctly, and changed my server ip but everytime someone tries to log in to my server with my client, they get an error when trying to log in. I am running a delta server. Do you think the problem could be in server.java or something server sided?

item.title: Players can connect with an ip changer, but not my client?
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

Search if u setted the right IP in the client.java
also check if the ports are equal to the ones in ur source.

also maybe search for the gui/egui.java and check the IP in there

Read full topic
item.source: Players can connect with an ip changer, but not my client?

item.title: Players can connect with an ip changer, but not my client?
item.dc:creator: @MareInTheMoon MareInTheMoon
item.description:
@MareInTheMoon wrote:

Did you change your client’s default IP address to your new one?
